Message: Today I am feeling tired and I am not in the mood to train.

It's completely natural to have off days, but let's try to focus on how much your body needs this routine for overall wellbeing. Shall we take it a little easier today, still making progress while listening to your needs? I'm here to support you.
Today is a good day, but I dont think that I will manage to train for marathon as I would like to.

That's alright. Every session doesn't need to be a personal best. The consistency of showing up matters most, along with adjusting pace or distance to maintain a healthy balance. We'll keep working towards your goals, one step at a time.
Today I am sad and I dont know if training could help me get better.

Emotions often intertwine with physical wellness. While exercise may not directly solve sadness, it can positively impact your general outlook by releasing endorphins. If you feel up to it, we can attempt a lighter, more meditative workout to see how it affects your mood. Remember, there
